channel.title: Tech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Tech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Disinformation Floods Social Media After Nicolás Maduro’s Capture
item.description: From seemingly AI-generated videos to repurposed old footage, TikTok, Instagram, and X did little to stop the onslaught of misleading posts in the wak...

item.title: California residents can use new tool to demand brokers delete their personal data
item.description: A new tool should make it easier for California residents to limit data brokers’ ability to store and sell their personal information.

item.title: Framework Laptop 16 (RTX 5070) Review: A Dream Come True
item.description: With upgradable graphics, the Framework Laptop 16 achieves what PC nerds have only ever dreamed of.

item.title: Stop Using Your Keyboard and Start Using Handy, a Free Speech-to-Text App
item.description: It’s called Handy, and it uses AI models to accurately convert your speaking voice into text—all for free.

item.title: Bitfinex hacker Ilya Lichtenstein credits Trump for early release from prison
item.description: Ilya Lichtenstein, who pled guilty to money laundering charges tied to his role in the massive hack of crypto exchange Bitfinex, has apparently been r...

item.title: Tech billionaires cashed out $16 billion in 2025 as stocks soared
item.description: Jeff Bezos led the way. The Amazon founder sold 25 million shares for $5.7 billion in June and July, right around the time he was getting hitched to L...

item.title: Bitfinex hacker Ilya Lichtenstein credits Trump for early release from prison
item.description: Ilya Lichtenstein, who pled guilty to money laundering charges tied to his role in the massive hack of crypto exchange Bitfinex, has apparently been r...

item.title: The US Invaded Venezuela and Captured Nicolás Maduro. ChatGPT Disagrees
item.description: Some AI chatbots have a surprisingly good handle on breaking news. Others decidedly don’t.

item.title: 10 useful gadgets for your first apartment
item.description: From home security systems and smart smoke detectors to a sunrise alarm gently that wakes you up, here are the must-have gadgets for living in your fi...

item.title: India orders Musk’s X to fix Grok over ‘obscene’ AI content
item.description: India's IT ministry has given X 72 hours to submit an action-taken report.
